page.title: 17LIFESTYLES 3
page.content: {Social Survey (con) Thirdly housewives.We found the most people worked in Exeter but were amazed that the second largest group were those who worked either at home or from home.Surprisingly just over half the people belong to clubs in the village.The most popular club in Kenton was found to be the Wives Group.Of the parents who we asked 8% said they attend.Parents attend 31 differnt clubs and societies.Exeter is the most popular shopping center not surprisingly because it is quite near to Kenton about 15 minutes drive and it's one of the best shopping centres in Devon.We were surprised that Exmouth,Teignmouth and Chudleigh would even be on the places where parents shop.Interestingly parents watched more sports T.V programmes than any other type followed by the news.
